GameConsole.Model.Player

类 Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • GameConsole.Model.Player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    This class represents all of the data and funcionality that a player would have. All of the actions that a player would do eventually comes back to this class.

      • checkIfCanAttack

        public boolean checkIfCanAttack()
        This class will take in a country as well as the country it is going to attack. It will return the object of the country it wants to attack if the player is allowed to attack that country

        参数:

        countryName - the country name with String type
